citations.narrative:
Waste Disposal: There is water leaking on the floor under the 1st and 3rd rack on the right side of the guinea pig room.
Waste water and leakage from water pipelines under racks can provide an optimal area for the growth of bacteria and
mold/fungi which can cause animals to become ill. In addition, water leaking on the floor can attract insect pests and
cause unpleasant odors for the guinea pigs. Disposal systems such as watering systems must provide and be operated to
minimize infestations, odors, and disease hazards. Licensee must ensure that the watering system dose not leak on the
floor of the animal room. Correct by May 15, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
n

narrative:
3.25(d) 
   
Facilities, general. 
Waste Disposal: There is water leaking on the floor under the 1st and 3rd rack on the right side of the guinea pig room. 
Waste water and leakage from water pipelines under racks can provide an optimal area for the growth of bacteria and 
mold/fungi which can cause animals to become ill. In addition, water leaking on the floor can attract insect pests and 
cause unpleasant odors for the guinea pigs. Disposal systems such as watering systems must provide and be operated to 
minimize infestations, odors, and disease hazards. Licensee must ensure that the watering system dose not leak on the 
floor of the animal room. Correct by May 15, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a family member.
